title: Member's Device
description: Returns JSON file with the device by its id (vehicle_id param). Endpoint - https://api.route4me.com/api/v1/user/members/devices/{device_id}

device_id.title: Device ID
device_id.description: Device with given id only will be returned - PATH.

created_time_from_ts.title: Created Time from_ts
created_time_from_ts.description: Start period timestamp for created_time, unix timestamp in seconds

x-auth-token.title: X Authentication Token
x-auth-token.description: Authorization token that will be given after signing in - HEADER.

original_api_key.title: Original API Key
original_api_key.description: Authorization by Route4Me key, for Route4Me users - GET.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Only records from that offset will be considered

auth_token.title: Authentication Token
auth_token.description: Authorization token that will be given after signing in - GET.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: Use API with API key without authorization - GET.

last_moved_at_from_ts.title: Last Moved At trim_ts
last_moved_at_from_ts.description: Start period timestamp for last_moved_at, unix timestamp in seconds

last_position_received_trim_ts.title: Last Position Received trim_ts
last_position_received_trim_ts.description: End period timestamp for last_position_received, unix timestamp in seconds

x-original-api-key.title: X Original API Key
x-original-api-key.description: Authorization by Route4Me key in the http request header, for Route4Me users - HEADER.

last_moved_at_trim_ts.title: Last Moved At trim_ts
last_moved_at_trim_ts.description: End period timestamp for last_moved_at, unix timestamp in seconds

x-api-key.title: X API Key
x-api-key.description: Use API with API key without authorization - HEADER.

last_position_received_from_ts.title: Last Position Received from_ts
last_position_received_from_ts.description: Start period timestamp for last_position_received, unix timestamp in seconds

created_time_trim_ts.title: Created Time trim_ts
created_time_trim_ts.description: End period timestamp for created_time, unix timestamp in seconds
